title: When to support Chinese Text drawing?

comments.author: xiangzLL
comments.body:
你可以放个中文字体到工程里去，然后使用字体路径来实现的，
例：_textPaint.Typeface = SKTypeface.FromFile(platfromManger.Font);

comments.author: juepiezhongren
mattleibow
comments.body: Can I close this issue? It appears that you just needed to use a typeface that had Chinese characters.
